entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny this morning and early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High 10. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Tuesday 9 May 2023
